@RestController
@RequestMapping("/param")
@Api(tags = "å‚æ•°æ ¡éªŒ")
@Slf4j
public class ParamCheckController {

    @DubboReference(url = "dubbo://192.168.5.32:20880",validation = "true") //dubboè°ƒç”¨æ–¹å¼€å¯å‚æ•°æ ¡éªŒï¼ŒæœåŠ¡æä¾›æ–¹ä¹Ÿéœ€è¦
    private ParamCheckService paramCheckService;

    @GetMapping(value = "/check")
    @ApiOperation(value = "å‚æ•°æ ¡éªŒï¼ˆdubooå®˜æ–¹æä¾›çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼‰")
    public ResponseBean check(){
        ParamCheckDTO dto = new ParamCheckDTO()
                .setName(null).setSex(20);
        paramCheckService.check1(dto);
        return ResponseBean.SUCCESS("æ ¡éªŒ");
    }
    
}
